data.fullContent: Purchasing a home is stressful. The first-time homebuyer must go from house to house to find the perfect one. Once they've found the perfect house, they must then work with a lender, an agency such as a bank that loans them the money to buy the house, and an appraiser, who will estimate the value of the house. The buyer must also work with a real estate agent, a person who helps with many aspects of purchasing a home, including getting all the necessary types of insurance for their home. The buyer also must have a home inspection done, to become better aware of any possible safety, maintenance, and structural issues with the home. After that, the homebuyer can finalize the sale, take ownership of the house, and move in. Once they're in their new home, they can begin to adjust to their new neighborhood and fix the place up the way they want it.

q1.translation: 买房是有压力的。第一次买房的人必须挨家挨户寻找最合适的房子。一旦他们找到了完美的房子，他们必须与贷方合作，比如向他们贷款买房的银行机构，以及评估房屋价值的估价师。买家还必须与房地产经纪人合作，这个人会在买房的许多方面提供帮助，包括为他们的房子购买所有必要类型的保险。买家还必须对房屋进行检查，以便更好地了解房屋可能存在的安全、维护和结构问题。

The buyer must also ____ with a real estate agent, a person ____ helps with many ____ of purchasing a home, including getting all the necessary types of insurance ____ their home. The buyer also must ____ a home inspection done, to become better aware of any ____ safety, maintenance, and structural issues with the home.

q2.translation: 买房是有压力的。第一次买房的人必须挨家挨户寻找最合适的房子。一旦他们找到了完美的房子，他们必须与贷方合作，比如向他们贷款买房的银行机构，以及评估房屋价值的估价师。买家还必须与房地产经纪人合作，这个人会在买房的许多方面提供帮助，包括为他们的房子购买所有必要类型的保险。买家还必须对房屋进行检查，以便更好地了解房屋可能存在的安全、维护和结构问题。之后，购房者就可以完成交易，拥有房子的所有权，并搬进去。一旦他们住进了新家，他们就可以开始适应他们的新社区，并按他们想要的方式装修这个地方。

options.sentence: It was a brand new house that was going to be selling for a lot of money.
They decide to sell their house when they retire, hiring a real estate agent to manage things.
Most people, though, spend a lot of time researching and watching guides on how to purchase a house.
After that, the homebuyer can finalize the sale, take ownership of the house, and move in.

options.sentence: First-time homebuyers typically take a very long time searching for a home because they want to find the perfect place to live.
First-time homebuyers have a lengthy process when buying a home, including finding a real estate agent and getting money to buy the house.
Buying a home is stressful, but renting a home can often be much easier and have far fewer steps.
Buying a small home as your first house can reduce maintenance and energy costs compared to buying a larger home.
